thread.title: Newswire: Atlanta’s Zazie Beetz will play Domino in Deadpool 2
thread.title_full: Newswire: Atlanta’s Zazie Beetz will play Domino in Deadpool 2

author: William Hughes
title: Newswire: Atlanta’s Zazie Beetz will play Domino in Deadpool 2
text:
— Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) March 9, 2017 
Beetz—who’s also attached to Chance The Rapper’s upcoming pizza horror film Slice —beat out a lot of big-name competition for the part of Domino. Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Lizzy Caplan were both tossed around as potential choices to play the hard-bitten mercenary, who often serves as the straight-faced foil to Deadpool’s wacky mayhem in the comics. Meanwhile, there’s still no word on who might play Domino’s on-again, off-again gun-toting boyfriend, Cable, although Reynolds and company have been dropping increasingly unsubtle hints that he’ll show up in Deadpool 2.
